text:
@realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends You've been exposed.  You can't lie your way out of this one any more than you can lie your way out of the COVID-19 and BLM disasters.  You betrayed our military.  You betrayed our Constitution.  You betrayed the American people.  You betrayed your oath of office.

#TRE45ON
